name: @ikerin/directus-typegen-cli
description: CLI tool for generating Directus SDK TypeScript types

scripts.build:readme: directus-typegen generate --help | ansisvg --colorscheme 'Apple System Colors' --charboxsize 9x16 --marginsize=4x4 > docs/help.svg
scripts.is-already-published: npm view @ikerin/directus-typegen-cli versions --json | jq --exit-status 'any(. == $current)' --arg current $(cat package.json | jq -r '.version')
scripts.release: if [ $(bun run is-already-published) == true ]; then echo 'Already published'; else bun publish --access public; fi
